Key Match Events: The Astros fell behind early and failed to win the game despite multiple chances in extra innings.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros have a losing record in extra-innings games in four of five seasons since the introduction of the 'ghost runner' rule.
Others: The Astros were 2-7 in 2020, 9-8 in 2021, 5-6 in 2022, 1-8 last year, and 5-10 this season. Since the beginning of last year, the Astros are just 6-18 in extras.
